scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../functions && npm install && cd ../tests && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:functions
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:frontend && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build:functions && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.test:watch: cd tests && concurrently "npm run test:frontend:watch" "npm run test:backend:watch"
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../functions && npm run lint && cd ../tests && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd frontend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../functions && npm run lint:fix && cd ../tests && npm run lint:fix
scripts.typecheck: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../functions && npm run build && cd ../tests && npm run typecheck
scripts.security:check: npm run security:test && npm run security:monitor
scripts.security:audit: npm audit --audit-level=moderate && cd frontend && npm audit --audit-level=moderate && cd ../functions && npm audit --audit-level=moderate
scripts.quality:check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test:coverage
scripts.quality:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run typecheck
scripts.pre-deploy: npm run quality:check && npm run security:check
scripts.deploy:staging: firebase use ellaai-platform-staging && npm run build && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:production: firebase use ellaai-platform-prod && npm run build && firebase deploy
